name: Soul Convergence
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You overlap the area of the spell with ghostly re-enactments of many other similar events in the history of the world. When you cast this spell, and at the start of each of your turns, select three creatures and choose one effect for each creature:
-The creature can reroll any roll they make once during their turn, taking the result of the second roll.
-The creature is locked into repeating history, and has disadvantage on all attack rolls.
